alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 3:56PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm over the southwest Inland Empire will move west across southern Orange County through 430 PM... At 351 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Elsinore was moving west at 20 mph toward Trabuco Highlands and Portola Hills. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds downing tree limbs Damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mission Viejo, Lake Elsinore, Rancho Santa Margarita, Trabuco Canyon, Ortega Highway, eastern Silverado, Coto De Caza, Trabuco Highlands, Portola Hills and Santa Rosa Plateau. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent lightning is occurring with this storm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
